oscar.name: cbench-sources
oscar.summary: Cbench is a performance benchmarking infrastructure tool. It provides scripts and templates for an entire lifecycle of performance evaluation tasks from generation of jobs to parsing of the generated data. This package provides source rpm for the cbench tool. Any user can generate binary packages from these sources and spec file.
